title: 3v3 is dead.

replies.body: I'm the only person I know that ever played that on ranked...no one LITERALLY no one from the friends list has ever touched that....

> [{quoted}](name=Camille Ferrøs,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eQxkaz6a,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-31T20:18:18.270+0000)
>
> I'm the only person I know that ever played that on ranked...no one LITERALLY no one from the friends list has ever touched that....

I got gold 5 in twisted treeline at the beginning of the season for reward purposes and never went back :3

It wasen't bad, but other game modes are better

Busted matchmaking, long queue times, a fairly toxic meta which was left untouched for long (until the funneling changes which managed to add some diversity), lack of care from RIOT and, annoyingly, inability to participate in "regular" stuff you could just by playing RIFT. (Mastery 6/7 Tokens, numerous event quests etc.)

Truly an abandoned game mode from RIOT's side, any changes which happen on the Rift can impact 3v3 without them batting an eye.

There is one thing TT has over SR.

Decent turrets.
Queue ranked instead of norms lol

I remember the map before the rework, oh, so funny moments. The cheese in the 2 bot bushes. The jungle, very hard to beat that monsters, and the super dragon. A good a nd balanced meta, aahhhhhhhhh, I miss those times.
Then, as allways, they fucked up hard, and reowrk it with fucking altars. Fuck you Riot.
I agree let's hope they listen and do something about it.
A suggestion from a past dominion player here to TT players: keep it lowkey, do not be vocal about it. Be vocal enough and Rito might just outright remove your game mode :(....
If they modernized it with Events like Blitz it could be made to work.
Every game I ask if there are humans on there. Soon the bots will be programmed to say that.
I still remember the day Elise was released and they changed TT. They should revert it back to the original. Way more diversity and a lot more strategic.

Only fun I had on that map was when Hexakill was played on it. 

6v6 on a very small map? That's fun as hell!
The only thing 3's ever got me or my friends was banned. Not sure why that map makes me more toxic, but it does.
I've been there for a quite a while, and I've yet to find any bots.

They only show up in regular 3s on new accounts.

While it is true you can have a game where it is you and 5 bots it will only happen on a freshly made account.

> [{quoted}](name=Madsin25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eQxkaz6a,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2018-09-01T16:35:50.893+0000)
>
> They only show up in regular 3s on new accounts.
> 
> While it is true you can have a game where it is you and 5 bots it will only happen on a freshly made account.

Ah. That makes sense.
Completly right. I wrote simmilar post 2 months ago but no one gave it upvote

Was in que with my friend for 29 minutes before one other friend decided to join us and we lost summoners rift game including pick phase in draft pick in time span shorter than that. Cant wait for another dead game mode just like dominion.

Ranked TT queue times will rarely be over 2 mins.

People do not play normal 3 because it is pointless, you learn nothing, there is no bans and you can't see what the opponents have picked.

yeah, but you see, me and my friend playing ranked together will result in unfun experiences really quickly. Our skill difference is too great and eventually one would be too bad to have fun while other would eventually burn out after having to play 2v3 all the time. TT is unsupported mod just like dominion was and thats all there is with the issue of the mode.

They should balance it more absolutely. It is dead as far as what riot does for it.

Saying it is a dead mode as far as the amount of people that play and "only bots play TT" is just very far from the truth.
And then there is me.. with 1600 ranked 3s game hardstuck plat lol
i bet they wish they kept Crystal Scar and Dominion game mode now...
I bet nexus blitz will just flat out replace twisted treeline on official release

Ranked TT is not dead and pretty far from it.

Queue times are usually lower than SR.

This is only true for normal queue. 

Ranked 3 queue times are pretty low and will never have bots.
There are many bots because it's easy to level account there.

Real talk TT is actually a really fun map. LIke I used to be someone who spammed ranked summoner rift games. But this season I tried out some TT, and it's actually chill. Pretty fun mode that doesn't have a meta nearly as rigid as summoners rift. Luckily I haven't run into any bots.

I really wish riot would put a little bit of time on TT. Maybe add some fun new items. Occasional tweaks to the map to keep it fresh. It's a really nice looking map with a good flow.
Yup. It was great. Then they nerfed the crap out of the map. Lol.

true sis
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I play TT
Is this co-op TT or PvP TT? I very rarely see bots in co-op SR these days (after the new AC system).
Replace 3v3 with Nexus Blitz , bring back Domination and Rotating gamemodes
